original_text: The man took me through the south gate into the inside yard. He measured the gate. It was the same size as the gates in the outside wall.
korean_text: 그가 나를 데리고 그 남문을 통하여 안뜰에 들어가서 그 남문의 너비를 측량하니 크기는

sentences.original_text: The man took me through the south gate
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 나를 남쪽 문으로 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: It was the same size as the gates
